TEXT.TITLE: GM LAYING OFF 5,500 AT TWO MICHIGAN PLANTS
TEXT.BODY: General Motors Corp said it ordered temporary layoffs of 5,500 hourly workers to cut production and thereby reduce inventories of cars built at two plants later this month. A spokesman said 2,000 workers would be laid off one week beginning March 9 at GM's Detroit-Hamtramck luxury car plant. Another 3,500 will be laid off a week effective March 23 at GM's Lansing, Mich, plant which builds the company's "N-body" compact cars. Reuter
